summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 221W, Page 7, of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 4, Paramount Park Addition and Block 1, Olympic Hills Addition from RS 7200 to RM 800 contingent upon the recording of a properly executed, delivered and accepted Property Use and Development Agreement. (Petition of Dr. G.E. Deer, C.F. 283575).
